DOCNAME: CASE OF MÜNİRE DEMİREL v. TURKEY
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 5 - Right to liberty and security
JUDGES: Alvina Gyulumyan;Corneliu Bîrsan;Elisabet Fura;Ineta Ziemele;Josep Casadevall
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE . At the time of her application to the Court , she was incarcerated in the Kartal Special Type Prison .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was taken into police custody on suspicion of membership of an illegal organisation , the Dev - Sol ( Devrimci Sol – Revolutionary Left ) .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was detained on remand .
CARDINAL . On DATE the public prosecutor at ORG filed a bill of indictment against the applicant and charged her with membership of an illegal organisation under LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG of ORG held the first hearing in the case ( case no.CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) .

CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court ordered the applicant ’s release pending trial . However , the applicant was not released since on DATE the public prosecutor at ORG had filed a new bill of indictment which resulted in a second case against the applicant before ORG of ORG ( case no . CARDINAL/CARDINAL ) . The applicant was charged with attempting to undermine the constitutional order under LAW .
CARDINAL . On DATE these CARDINAL cases were joined under case no . CARDINAL before ORG of ORG .

CARDINAL . The applicant requested to be released pending trial at various times before the trial courts . The courts dismissed her requests either without giving any reason or having regard to the nature of the offence , the content of the case file and the state of evidence .
CARDINAL . NORP On DATE ORG of ORG once again dismissed the applicant ’s request for release pending trial .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed an objection against the decision of DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE FAC of ORG dismissed her request .
CARDINAL . On DATE the first - instance court ordered the applicant ’s release pending trial .

CARDINAL . By PERSON no . CARDINAL of DATE , published in ORG on DATE , state security courts were abolished . The case against the applicant was thereby transferred to ORG . According to the information in the case file based on the latest submissions by the parties , the case is still pending before ORG .
CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice in force at the material time are outlined in PERSON and GPE v. GPE , ( no . CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL , DATE ) .
